title: IDomeFeatureData2.ReleaseSelectionAccess
description: Releases access to the selections used to define this dome feature.
remarks:
IDomeFeatureData2::AccessSelections
and
IDomeFeatureData2::IAccessSelections
put the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature.
Use this method to restore the rollback state if you did not modify the feature or use
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
or
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
if you did.
